info.name: Oraclecorp Payslips Printing (hide web elements)
info.description:
works only on Oracle Employees Portal (internal website).
This css tweak removes all web-specific elements for printing payslips that less look like webprints and more like printed originals.
info.additionalInfo:
The web elements are removed when printing only (using css rule @media print).
Look at the print preview and check it, they should be gone!

data.title: How to appear in Library tab (chrome)
